website_summaries.verdict: The Brainwavz HM5s sound great, are very comfortable, and are able to compete with high-end headphones for a relatively affordable price.
pros: The Brainwavz HM5 is an excellent set of monitor headphones yet it's still able to make music enjoyable to listen to
the package includes two different-lengthed cables and a spare set of earcups
the build quality is very good and the fit is very comfortable
cons: the sound can lack low-end punch and high-end sparkle, making them not so suited to dance music
and apparent clones are available for much cheaper online

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Ive had these over a year im pretty sure and the hinge holding the cans on has broken twice due to poor material usage on said hinge. Unless they change the hinge to metal stay away. The replacements are $15 and last less than a year. This means that these headphones will cost you hundreds of dollars to continually repair over their lifetime. real shame considering they sound great and feel so comfy. if i had a cnc id make the part and sell it myself
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones, Longetivity Issues
customer_reviews.text: I owned these headphones and used them almost everyday for close to two years. near the start of my use the gimbals came loose (The gimbal is made of two pieces screwed together, and they were bending away from each other, letting the headband escape). I glued it together and it lasted me up until now. The product is extremely comfortable, with high quality sound. I would not recommend this product, as the gimbal broke and there are no really good options. As countless others have said, the gimbal arms crack and render the product unusable.
customer_reviews.author: D Talbert

customer_reviews.title: broken out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The sockets on the ear cups didn't hold the jacks. Both were loose and a jack even fell out once. So it was either no sound or intermittent sound if I held the jack just so. They were comfortable, nice case, extra ear pads and cable. Nice sound for the few seconds I could hear anything. I expected better for $100. Sent it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Surkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones for sound and equalization.
customer_reviews.text: When I first listen to the headphones they sounded hollow. From the reviews I read on line these are suppose to be decent for the price point. I couldn't understand why so many people like these headphones. Then I read a couple more reviews. Let me first tell you my setup. Asus Essence STX with Burson Audio opamps. I'm not an audiophile. The reviews let me know that I needed to amplify and equalize these headphones to my liking. Once I heeded the suggestions they sounded really good. Amplification caused the hollow sound to go away and using the equalizer brought out a wider sound. I now use the headphones while flying X-plane.
customer_reviews.author: Roger B.

customer_reviews.title: Frequency response is flat as a board
customer_reviews.text: I have had many headphones. This is the least colored, flattest frequency response of any headphone I have ever heard. I do digitizing / remastering and these phones allow me to hear exactly what what was recorded. There are not enough stars to muster for these superb, rugged, well engineered headphones. Can I give 50 stars?
customer_reviews.author: bryan  kendall

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones so far. At the start.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality headphones, best I've had so far. Better than my steelseries v2 which was good in itself. The disconnect-able wires make this so much better, as the most common problem with my headphones going out is wire breaks at the connection, this comes with 2 wires, so even if 1 ever goes, I have a spare. -Final update to review, the speakers still work, but the plastic is cheap and snapped in several areas after constant use, used cement glue to fix it, the 3m coord also stopped working at one point, and upon contacting for a replacement headset to fix every issue, they would only replace the coord. I would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and beautifully made but if you have a lerge head, don't buy online..
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are wonderful for s normal size head I'm guessing but, not for a large head. Very uncomfortable past 10 or 15 minutes. Find a place you can try them on for 20 minutes BEFORE YOU BUY THEM. PS I emailed the company and they suggested I buy some aftermarket ear pads. I looked. The ones I've found are over an inch front to back. That makes them as think as what's stock? Where's the upside?
customer_reviews.author: TheHonestCritic

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad piece of gear- at all
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad piece of gear- at all.. For this price, I am pretty astounded by its presentation. Bass is nice and laxed, mids maybe a bit shy for my taste, highs are brilliant and not harsh. The soundstage is a little too narrow for my liking and I really can't say these cans are faithful to the recording... but rest assured, they are pretty damn close. For 100 or so bucks, you're not going to find better, friends. UPDATE: I've decided to mod these using drivers from my beat up Audio Technica ATH700. Woah!!!!
customer_reviews.author: N. Zero

customer_reviews.title: close to 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like the sound of these headphones. They are exactly as many reviewers have described - neutral. Isolation is excellent. The only reason I didn't give them 5 stars is the clamping force on these cans is just too much. I've been able to stretch the headband "spring" out a bit, so they are a little more comfortable. Maybe a set of the velour pads would help, but I'm not sure I'm willing to spend another $30. The sound is excellent, so if you have a smaller head, I say go for it.
customer_reviews.author: jeff h

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I returned a pair of Bose that were too heavy, hard to use, hurt to wear. I consulted independent research and decided these were exactly what I wanted- wired (long cord), travel case is extra bonus, simple pads & changeable, great sound quality (I am not in the studio or an audiophile, I just like to listen to "my music" while online & my husband hates my musical choices! ) Well, my husband liked mine so much , he got a pair for himself and he LOVES them too. Great price, great sound, and an extra set of earpads ! Thanks BrainWavz- HM5 is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Di Nader

customer_reviews.title: Finally, comfortable headphones
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are simply EXCELLENT ! I could not take my Audio-technica headphones any more and after exhaustive search for comfortable headphone with a large ear cups I ordered a pair of HM5 and I simply could not be happier. I also had at various points Bose, Sennhaiser and Beats but these are just so much more comfortable, simply no comparison. Buying another pair for work.
customer_reviews.author: markymark

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Neutral sounding headphones that sound great and don't break the bank. The sound quality is one of the best for the price range. Noise isolation is fantastic as well. Very comfortable, the earpads have plenty of foam and the headband is padded as well. The cables are high quality and don't transmit too much noise when they are touched. Build quality is great for the price, the band itself is made of metal, with plastic pieces to keep the weight and cost down. Better buy than the audio technica m40xs. If you're looking for a closed back headphone with a neutral sound signature, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: x

customer_reviews.title: These are super comfy, no pain after several hours
customer_reviews.text: I pondered this decision for a while looking at the usual suspects in the 100-150$ range, ended up choosing these because of hearing reports of how comfy these are ( I do not have streamlined ears). No regrets so far. These are super comfy, no pain after several hours. The sound is so much better than the cheapo cans I had, but I cannot truly compare them the the ath-40 or 558s I was also considering because I can't do a side by side. My wife was covering them last night, so I have a feeling we may be adding a second pair soon. Looking forward to my next long flight, these have excellent isolation.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Brainwavz HM5 or Pokemon Move "Cut" Studio Monitor Headphones 2-1-15
customer_reviews.text: great pair of headphones, came with two cables one 9 or so feet and the other 3? earpads on the headphones and another in the case it comes with too and a red pouch for cabling. sound is very great and they're Studio which is a flat equalizer of sorts, like Beats by Dre eq is bass turned up while some of the Sennheiser's I owned seemed to turn up the Treble a little. these give you sound that is unaltered, great for movies and gaming as is why I use them plus my music. I am the average audio guy, so my word isn't strong here.
customer_reviews.author: W. Lisbourne

customer_reviews.title: Very warm sounding
customer_reviews.text: So far I haven't found anything which glares out as a problem. The price was right, the headphones sound exceptional for their cost, and overall they are not fatiguing, so I think given their price, they're a bang-for-buck purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K

customer_reviews.title: these cans have held up very well and continue to sound great. Not bad
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of use, these cans have held up very well and continue to sound great.Not bad... For this price, you get a slew of accessories...I mean a hardshell carrying case, yes I love them. I'll be getting another set.
customer_reviews.author: Lionel

customer_reviews.title: Product gimbal cracked within 8 months of regular use
customer_reviews.text: I got these headphones less than 8 months ago. The audio quality is pretty good, but these are not worth the price considering that they commonly break within a year of regular use. Just like many other reviewers' pairs, mine broke at the gimbal holding one of the earpieces, making the headphones unwearable.
customer_reviews.author: John Hadley

customer_reviews.title: I love them. Was gonna buy the beats but these ...
customer_reviews.text: Got them delivered fast. I love them. Was gonna buy the beats but these are way better. Need to make more of them though i think was only like 1 pair left lol but good job brain wavz
customer_reviews.author: Brandon fiasco

customer_reviews.title: Great Neutral Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Really excellent pair of neutral headphones. If you want a lot of bass, these are not for you, but they are wonderful for critical listening on the go. They can also be EQed to your preferred sound. No amp necessary, but pairs well with FiiO A5.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Constantino

customer_reviews.title: Good sound not made to last.
customer_reviews.text: Had them for three months and worked great. I don't even know what I did but now the right ear phone is loose and doesn't stay on my ear. Alongside that they feel cheap for their price because whenever you move them the plastic creaks loudly in your ear when you're barely moving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: You get a lot for your money. The headphones are great, 2 sets of headphone cables (long and short), and a quality case. These are great headphones
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and they sound good
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and they sound good. Very balanced sound. Great packaging. Nice carrying case and accessories. I used them for gaming and they sound better than my Astor A50 i spent 300 dollars on.
customer_reviews.author: daniel christian litty

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, questionable build
customer_reviews.text: They sounded great for the price, but even though I don't have a particularly big head I found the clamp extremely strong and unlike other headphones they didn't really loosen over time. What did happen is the plastic began to crack near the slider so I had to have them replaced. The pads of course were extremely comfortable, if you have a small head or like a firm clamp then they are definitely worth your time.
customer_reviews.author: Karl W.

customer_reviews.title: Neutral and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully neutral, exceedingly comfortable headphones. The earpads are plush and completely surround yourself ears, sealing out the world. So nice to have a pair of cans that don't try to kill you with too much bass. My fiio Q1 drives them like a champ. THE best bargain in affordable monitors!
customer_reviews.author: calvin j.

customer_reviews.title: ... online reviewer on YouTube called them "so soft it's like babies cuddling your face
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones after an online reviewer on YouTube called them "so soft it's like babies cuddling your face," and I'm happy to say that's not an exaggeration. These headphones are snug, but thanks to the extremely soft and roomy ear pads you don't feel much pressure. And the sound quality? I'd take comfortable headphones over good sounding ones any day, but I don't have to make that choice with the HM5--they sound terrific, whatever genre of music I throw at it. I've already recommended them to friends, and any nonbeliever quickly convert after trying them on.
customer_reviews.author: Hung Le

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, but the top band has two metal ...
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, but the top band has two metal pieces that I can feel after prolonged use. If you're going to be wearing them for longer than 3 hrs I would recommend something else
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: so I'm not really sure how to describe why these are good, but I was recommended them by a headphone ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know a whole lot about headphones, so I'm not really sure how to describe why these are good, but I was recommended them by a headphone community online and they've been one of the best purchases I've made in a long while. Super comfortable, sound quality is fantastic, shuts out outside noise quite well, comes with a nice firm case for safe transport, and the detachable cord is great for easy untangling and not tearing if it gets caught on things.
customer_reviews.author: Leila

customer_reviews.title: Sound A+, Head band C-
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound and the ear pads are heaven. Too bad the creaking of the head band overshadows the positive.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the headphones, the ear pads do get a little hot, I wish they included a set of the velour ones instead of an extra "leather" set.
customer_reviews.author: K.P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for hearing intricate details of a song, though not very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond W.

customer_reviews.title: Elite Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones right here I cannot tell it in words ... it's like having 2 plush pillows on yr ears. And the sound is incredible 5 stars hands down I love ❤️ these headphones
customer_reviews.author: O. Wilburn

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphones, better than the ATH-M50s.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headphones. Better than the ATH-M50s in my opinion. It has great clarity and better lows than the M50s. It also is more comfortable and is provided with an extra cable and extra earcups. Given that it is cost competitive with the M50s that doesn't provide those extras, this makes it the best bang for the buck in the $100 price range.
customer_reviews.author: Jing Hau Soong

customer_reviews.title: ★∞♡ "Great Quality Sound!"
customer_reviews.text: It was more than I had bargained for. It was perfect. An equalizer are for chumps!
customer_reviews.author: Joehasen L.

customer_reviews.title: Great cans. I use these with an electronic drum ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cans. I use these with an electronic drum kit to great effect. Detachable cables are quite useful and reassuring, should anything ever happen to the ones currently attached. I've listened to these side by side with my older Beyer DT990's and I was surprised at how I was able to hear parts of mixes that I hadn't noticed at all before
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Other than that I really like them.
customer_reviews.text: The ear pads need to be made from a breathable material. My ears are sweating when I wear them while doing my walk. Other than that I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Smokeyrope

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware: earpiece clamp will break!
customer_reviews.text: Although these are a great sounding pair of headphones, do be warned that the plastic which holds the actual earpiece is prone to breakage from regular use. After about a year the right clamp started cracking, and is now to the point where it's unusable. It isn't just a single faulty piece either, since the other side shows some the beginnings of the same cracking pattern as well. The damage became unbearable just past my warranty period, and even though these pieces can be easily removed and replaced, both the seller, mp3nation, and brainwavz have stated they couldn't offer me replacement parts. Thus, I can not recommend anyone buy these. Spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Rich

customer_reviews.title: Sound is amazing, read mixed reviews about cracking on right earpiece
customer_reviews.text: Sound is amazing, read mixed reviews about cracking on right earpiece, bought it anyway, right gimbal cracked within 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Booperdooper

customer_reviews.title: He said they were awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I gave them to my grandson. He said they were awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Elena R. Speidel

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortably and light weight. With great sound
customer_reviews.text: Very Comfortably and light weight. Totally covers your ears. Love the sound quality. Can wear them for hours and are still comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The quality of sound is good but it clamps a bit too hard on my ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of sound is good but it clamps a bit too hard on my head (~21.5"). I find it difficult to wear my glasses and the headphone at the same time. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly and very good confortable.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Fit perfectly and very good confortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for evenings when wife or company goes to bed ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly clear sound production! Fantastic for evenings when wife or company goes to bed early! I'm a little hard of hearing, and it was difficult increasing the sound level for me to hear. Now? No problem whatsoever. At times I really have to "crank it down!" Wonderful headphones!
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Staudacher

customer_reviews.title: Brainwavz HM 5 headphones
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are exactly what I expected after watching reviews on YouTube from a handful of people I've used them a few times really really comfortable and nice and clear just what I was looking for at a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Burrell

customer_reviews.title: ... have no problems with the headphones they work just fine
customer_reviews.text: I have no problems with the headphones they work just fine
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Waller

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, even after wearing the headphones for an hour, and excellent sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: VK Budd

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good headphones for Entry levels
customer_reviews.text: These are an awesome pair of headphones. I really love the sound. They are comfy, however isolation is okay. Its not the best, its not the worst, its alright. Also the clamping force on the mh5 are a bit tight. I had to stretch them out a bit. -EDIT- So, I've had these baby for about 6 months. Really rugged pair. I wear them to gym or by my desk and they are still going strong. Sound is great, i'm not really and audiophile, but Listening to some punk rock like Green Day, sound just great. The clamping force on these have died down and are still very VERY comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Kameron Gill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these headphones. Great sound and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: M. Alston

customer_reviews.title: The replacement works fine. Very neutral
customer_reviews.text: First pair I got had a rattle in the left ear. The replacement works fine. Very neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Obvious Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: getting better and better
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that these Brainwav HM5's are an excellent value not only in the sound and build quality but also in what comes bundled with it. Nice hard shell case, quarter inch adapter, stereo adapter for plane trips, e|xtra pads, 2 sets of cable short and long. Ok for SQ, was kinda flat, but how sounding compared to my Sony Pulse hs, and Ultrasone hfi-780's. I'm leaving these cans on the burner and now after about a week punchy lows and slightly undertoned highs are filling out
customer_reviews.author: Jason S. Paek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good product - the headphones perform well, kit includes good accessories. rapid delivery
customer_reviews.author: David Goodale

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality. I love to use it. A bit bulky for air travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This headset will crack in half if you so much ...
customer_reviews.text: This headset will crack in half if you so much as bump it against a pillow. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound, solid low end and very comfortable. Well pleased with purchase and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Coy Rich

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift for my husband. The first pair we got broke within a month. The company was very good about letting us return them and sending us a new pair. we have had no problems with the new pair but it did cost us quite a bit of money to return the old pair.
customer_reviews.author: Heddy  Ginterreiter

customer_reviews.title: Good Cans
customer_reviews.text: They are very neutral. They come with two cables. They come with replacement pads. They came in a very nice little carrying case. All in all they are pretty great cans. The only con is that the pads included make them earmuffs. They get very hot.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Golden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What I imagined, comes with little case for it all
customer_reviews.author: shazamazon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are all that previous reviewers stated and more. Very well built and has all the extras. Sound is clean with nothing added and you hear the music as it was recorded. Also, the headphones are very comfortable. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Decent cans but is a little to tight even for me who have a very small head and face
customer_reviews.author: RXL

customer_reviews.title: Feel good gift
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a great item, a must have for gamers, and music enthusiasts. My son says they are sheer perfection. Mine were refurb, but they are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Thais Cesare

customer_reviews.title: incredibly disappointed. the pads
customer_reviews.text: incredibly disappointed. the pads: super comfortable, phenomenal. super deep. brilliant. the sound: great quality, i use a little dac/amp and the sound was fantastic. really enjoyed that aspect.. however the reason i threw these away was the comfort.. the clamp pressure. the clamp pressure is unbearable. after an hour or so of wearing these I would develop the worst headaches around my temples and around my ears. This was even after weeks of 'wearing them in'. Normally i'm not a picky person, i've used plenty of headphones from different well known brands and these were by far the most painful headphones to put on. they are constantly trying to squeeze your head like a grape. just a warning.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Reopell

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 12 year old budding musician, so she could create at the keyboard. She uses them for everything. Keyboard, iPad, ipod, gaming--whatever she can plug them into. It was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Rubino

customer_reviews.title: Great Pair of Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pair of headphones, I modded them a bit by adding padding in each ear cup. I like the difference it made. Not going to get technical with the review (other people have done that already) but if you're looking for neutral studio headphones this is the pair for you!
customer_reviews.author: SparkyCodePants

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre sound quality but very comfortable. Hinge broke off a few months later and ...
customer_reviews.text: Mediocre sound quality but very comfortable. Hinge broke off a few months later and according to manufacturer will take a month to receive a replacement part. Part arrived and unit has now been fixed. Although shipping took over a month, it was very well worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great for Gaming
customer_reviews.text: The HM5s sound awesome and are large enough to be comfortable for people who have big ears, like. I've been using them for about a week now for gaming, and they really bring environments to life through the nuances you pick up in audio.
customer_reviews.author: JeffOnAnIsland

customer_reviews.title: Broken in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: First off the sound is great and the two cord sizes were awesome. At first I didn't think the price was too steep but six months later plastic shards are breaking off and I cut my ear. Both the left and right side slider casings started to crack and break off the same day. To top it off I can't get anyone to return my emails about the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Max Powers

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It sounds great. Kind of heavy and bulky for the head.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Gerena,Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Better than Momentum 2, and 200 dollars cheaper than Momentum 2
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Brainwavz HM5 headphone and I love it. The headphone is very comfortable, and has good noise isolation. The sound is warm and sweet. It sound is very similar to Sennheiser Momentum (and Momentum 2), as both headphone has flat frequency responses. This brainwavz headphone really worth its price.
customer_reviews.author: seyed mahdi ghamkhari

customer_reviews.title: The sound is good, and it cancels out background noise well
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good, and it cancels out background noise well, but the headphone arm broke after 1.6 years. I feel like a $130 pair of headphones should last a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Really nice headphones
customer_reviews.text: Sweet Headphones, sound bright and clear. Seems flat to my ears. Really good purchase. I also liked the case it comes with and the extra ear pad are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Renato Perotto Machado

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great Headphones, very clear and neutral, great for monitoring, or just listening to music. Also at an amazing price. I recommend these to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Nice Package
customer_reviews.text: Really nice neutral sounds and delivery was prompt and solid. Comes with a lot of extras for the cost. All around great headphones.
customer_reviews.author: EDIBLE

customer_reviews.title: Too cheap for the price
customer_reviews.text: Have used those during the last year (at work, to isolate myself from "open space") with care, and the plastic frame broke on the both sides. They are comfortable and isolate from environment quite well (better than beyerdynamic 770 pro I bought as replacement) , the sound is flat and not disturbing (I was able to use them during the day long without any fatigue). Given those problems (cheap plastic frame, sound quality of 10$ headphones from aliexpress) my opinion is that they don't worth the money. I liked the comfort, noise isolation and the cable length.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best mid range headphones in its class.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headphones for a reasonable price. The headphone cushion is probably the best my ears have ever felt. Sound is amazing and it is a must have for an audiophile👍
customer_reviews.author: 4EVERME

customer_reviews.title: Very nice headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very nice headphones I purchased the speakers They are very wonderful and very clear sound and hear every detail and you need 50 hours of use until you reach for the best sound that at first the sound is very clear, light and forget I used headphones Wonderful in every sense of the word But Lissa and reason when he received speaker box was open and there is no guarantee card as having been used by Fargo was sent to me to consider Were not present 1 x Instruction manual 1 x Warranty card
customer_reviews.author: Paste iPad

customer_reviews.title: Feels good over the ear but that's it.
customer_reviews.text: These HM5 headphones feel great over the ear. They are probably the best feeling headphones I've ever bought. The problem I noticed quickly was the lack of sound quality. The audio clarity was the first thing I noticed missing and the mid-range sound is cheap sounding. The headphone sounds muffled with no clarity on the high, medium or low end. "The HM5 headphones sound muffled." My old headphone set I was replacing is a Sony MDR-V6 (the red ones). I've had these since the late 90s. I'm buying a new set now after listening to these Brainwavz HM5. I can not recommend Brainwavz HM5 headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

product_meta.title: BRAINWAVZ HM5 Studio Monitor Headphones
feature_bullets: Neutral sound signature - Your music will sound how it should!
1.2m and 3m detachable cables included, use with your portable rig or home rig
Large, comfortable over the ear cups

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars306 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
